name: Kloud
description: 100% Malt Real Beer. Original Gravity. Rich & Smooth. Kloud is a premium beer that uses European hops and yeast from Germany.

name: Hoegaarden
description: Unfiltered Belgian White, flavored with coriander and orange peel, creating a sweet & sour taste.

name: OB Golden Lager

name: Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier
description: Smells very bready and yeasty with a little bit of banana. Pours a very active and tall off-white head.
